Package org.oddjob.arooa.xml

Classes for parsing XML.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    XMLConfiguration.SaveHandler  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    JAXPUtils
    Collection of helper methods that retrieve a ParserFactory or Parsers and Readers.
    NamespaceHelper
    Utility functions to help with the namespace.
    XMLArooaAttributes  
    XMLArooaParser
    An ArooaParser that parses an ArooaConfiguration into an XML string.
    XMLConfiguration
    An ArooaConfiguration that wraps some XML data and allows it to be parsed.
    XMLConfigurationNode  
    XmlHandler2
    Converts ArooaHandler.onStartElement(ArooaElement, ArooaContext) events into an internal DOM.
    XMLInterceptor
    This handler converts the events back into XML.
